features.featureTitle: Update the Contact Us form submit flow so that when the user presses the Submit/Register button, the app opens a WhatsApp chat to the owner number 918829921156 using a wa.me link with a pre-filled message containing the submitted form details (full name, phone number, and city).

Fix the Contact form UX so it no longer only shows an in-app 'received your information' confirmation without sending/opening WhatsApp; instead, after a successful validation, it must initiate the WhatsApp open action and provide a clear on-page indication if the WhatsApp window/tab could not be opened (e.g., popup blocked) with guidance to use the displayed link/button to open WhatsApp manually.
